definition: (architecture) a statue or a human bust or an animal carved out of the top of a square pillar, name formally or designate with a term
details:
noun
- (architecture) a statue or a human bust or an animal carved out of the top of a square pillar
= synonyms: terminal figure
- any distinct quantity contained in a polynomial
= example: any distinct quantity contained in a polynomial
- a word or expression used for some particular thing
= example: a word or expression used for some particular thing
- one of the substantive phrases in a logical proposition
= example: one of the substantive phrases in a logical proposition
- (usually plural) a statement of what is required as part of an agreement
= synonyms: condition
- a limited period of time
= example: a limited period of time
- the end of gestation or point at which birth is imminent
= example: the end of gestation or point at which birth is imminent
= synonyms: full term
verb
- name formally or designate with a term
